name: FRENZY PLANTS
description:
Frenzy Plants is an adventure of a little bunny girl in the forest where she lives. One day she learns that plants growing in the forest can do incredible things with someone who uses them correctly.

Frenzy Plants is an adventure game in which you need to explore a previously unseen forest and everything under it. The forest is full of creatures that may negatively relate to you, but you cannot harm them, find a way to get to the end.
Explore and find all the treasures of the forest before your journey ends.
